newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA - NOON RADIO HEADLINES - JUNE 4.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA - NOON RADIO HEADLINES - JUNE 4.

text.p: Here are the main headlines from Lithuania's M-1 plus radio station's noon news report on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President of Finland, Martii Ahtisaari, supported the aim of the Baltic countries to join NATO despite objections from Russia.
- The finance ministry announced an open tender to privatise the State Commercial Bank.
- The constitutional court starts consideration today whether the former government had the right to issue 50 million litas of financial aid to bankrupt commercial banks Aurabank and Vakaru.
